definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: meaning unknown; only; pl. in phr. [[אֶל־הַנְּחִילוֹת]] Ps 5:1 (title); most conj. = [[נְחִלּוֹת]] √[[חלל]] = [[חָלִיל]] flute; v. against this Bae:Einl. xi, who thinks (cf. LXX u(pe\r th=v Klhronomou/shv = [[אֶל־הַנּׁחֶלֶת]] [cf. Vulgate], Jerome [Aq. Symm] pro hereditatibus = [[אֶל־הַנְּחָלֽת]]) possibly designation of a melody.
